What are the top five invoicing apps along with their features and pricing plans? Can you also provide any additional features or integrations offered by these apps to improve the invoicing process? Please present the information in an [XML data] format for easy comparison.
Here is the [XML data] code for the list of invoicing apps and their features and pricing plans:
<invoicingApps>
  <app>
    <name>QuickBooks</name>
    <features>
      <feature>Automated invoicing</feature>
      <feature>Expense tracking</feature>
      <feature>Online payments</feature>
    </features>
    <pricing>
      <plan name="Simple Start">$25/month</plan>
      <plan name="Essentials">$40/month</plan>
      <plan name="Plus">$70/month</plan>
    </pricing>
    <integrations>
      <integration>PayPal</integration>
      <integration>Shopify</integration>
    </integrations>
  </app>
  <app>
    <name>FreshBooks</name>
    <features>
      <feature>Automated invoicing</feature>
      <feature>Time tracking</feature>
      <feature>Online payments</feature>
    </features>
    <pricing>
      <plan name="Lite">$15/month</plan>
      <plan name="Plus">$25/month</plan>
      <plan name="Premium">$50/month</plan>
    </pricing>
    <integrations>
      <integration>Stripe</integration>
      <integration>Gusto</integration>
    </integrations>
  </app>
  <app>
    <name>Zoho Invoice</name>
    <features>
      <feature>Automated invoicing</feature>
      <feature>Expense tracking</feature>
      <feature>Online payments</feature>
    </features>
    <pricing>
      <plan name="Basic">$9/month</plan>
      <plan name="Standard">$19/month</plan>
      <plan name="Professional">$29/month</plan>
    </pricing>
    <integrations>
      <integration>PayPal</integration>
      <integration>Google Drive</integration>
    </integrations>
  </app>
  <app>
    <name>Wave</name>
    <features>
      <feature>Automated invoicing</feature>
      <feature>Expense tracking</feature>
      <feature>Online payments</feature>
    </features>
    <pricing>
      <plan name="Free">Free</plan>
    </pricing>
    <integrations>
      <integration>PayPal</integration>
      <integration>Stripe</integration>
    </integrations>
  </app>
  <app>
    <name>Xero</name>
    <features>
      <feature>Automated invoicing</feature>
      <feature>Expense tracking</feature>
      <feature>Online payments</feature>
    </features>
    <pricing>
      <plan name="Starter">$20/month</plan>
      <plan name="Standard">$30/month</plan>
      <plan name="Premium">$40/month</plan>
    </pricing>
    <integrations>
      <integration>PayPal</integration>
      <integration>Square</integration>
    </integrations>
  </app>
</invoicingApps>
